## Linear Regression

The null hypothesis is that there is no relationship between group and gene expression.

```{r}
mod = model.matrix( ~ pdata$Group + pdata$RIN)
fit = lmFit(filt_edata, mod)
eb_fit = eBayes(fit)
topTable(eb_fit)
```






```{r}
tstats_obj = rowttests(filt_edata,pdata$Group)
hist(tstats_obj$statistic,col=2)

```
